website_summaries.verdict: You may not recognize the brand of this mower, but it's worth a look if you want a self-propelled gas-powered option that can tackle typical lawn-mowing tasks.
pros: A basic mower that comes at a mid-range price and includes a bag
161cc engine is powerful enough for small to mid-sized yards
Earns praise for starting with minimal effort
Two-year warranty is impressive for the price
cons: Brand isn't very well-known, which may be concerning to some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Good mower for the money
customer_reviews.text: I did have some initial problems getting the mower started the first time but it runs great. Speed of mowing was not an issue either. It was the right speed for me. There is no adjustment for speed either so I was concerned but so far the mower has been great.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie

customer_reviews.title: One pull starting after the initial start
customer_reviews.text: This lawn mower is both maneuverable , powerful fairly easy to assemble one small flaw air filter the size is not available even from powersmart I bought a foam filter to replace the paper one when the paper one dies oh I used a Stearns 100 - 606 filter just a drop of oil squeeze it put it in when it gets dirty wash it and do the same oil to put it in
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Power Drive
customer_reviews.text: I mowed three times and on the third attempt the power drive quit working. I tried to have the service department contact me but it wouldn't accept my phone number. Now you all know how hard it is to ship a lawn mower back after the box is gone and you spent the time to put it together. The mower runs good and starts good but why doesn't the power drive work after just three mowing's.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Lawnmower
customer_reviews.text: I sent this mower to my 80 year old mother. She put it together, added oil & gas only to discover oil leaked out because of a crack in engine. I’m not close & I can’t help her return this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Great little mower!
customer_reviews.text: I had no problems starting for the first time, took 3 pulls! And it is fast! Also its light so you can just push it in difficult areas. It has a strong motor, blade cuts fine, easy to assemble only really the handle bar. Lets see how long it last, I expect over the 2 yr warranty. I like the single bar to raise and lower each axles.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Runs Like a Top
customer_reviews.text: I did lots of research for a self-propelled mower at the insistence of my wife who did not like to see me struggling to push a mower around the yard in the Texas summer heat. My new PowerSmart mower arrived two days earlier than scheduled (a good thing) and I eagerly assembled it to give it a trial run. I was pleasantly surprised at the initial performance and how it moves around so crisply. Now, I may have a hard time keeping up with it. Certainly a good buy and no wonder an Amazon Choice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerhouse of a Lawnmower!
customer_reviews.text: This lawnmower is awesome! What a powerhouse! We had a self push mower, and we waited for this to come until we cut our grass again because our old one is too hard to push. The grass got pretty high, and this lawnmower plowed right through it with no effort at all. It was really easy to assemble, and we love it! Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: CathyP

customer_reviews.title: Good push mower...
customer_reviews.text: The mower is a good mower however, my dad spent over an hour putting the belt back on after it snapped off after about 10 minutes into mowing only for it to if course snap off again... The belt is what allows the mower to self propel. If you dont mind pushing then it does well but the point of purchasing a self propelled mower is so that you dont have to push.
customer_reviews.author: Nishawndra

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: This thing is dangerous it moves way too fast and when you lift up the front wheels to maneuver the unit if you are still engaged in gear it actually speeds up even faster do not let your kids use this thing!there are also many keep parts made on a plastic that will obviously break pretty soon
customer_reviews.author: Michael Low

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Mower was easy to put together and started right away. The only thing that I would want would be a way to slow it down. You can either manually push it or when using the self propel have it go much faster than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Plaza

customer_reviews.title: Worst Lawnmower I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to start. Won't run at all until the self-propelled lever is engaged, which means you back it up w/o the wheels fighting against you and digging up the yard, its weight is unbalanced and it does wheelies because its heavier in the back, making it hard to control. I've owned other self-propelled push mowers and this one I absolutely HATE and do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Princess of Prayer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I had a ryobi electric mower, worked well enough but I got fed up with batterys draining before I could finish the lawn. Decided to upgrade to the power smart. I’m happy with the purchase. No more overheating batterys to manage, no more half cut lawns. It was pretty simple to put together though the instructions weren’t very helpful. Also, it doesn’t specify how to remove the spark plug but it comes with a tool to remove it. Weird but tomorrow’s problem. I’ve had this for about 4 months, hadn’t experienced any issues. The grass bag attaches easy, the self propelling works well but uses more gas, everything’s simple and easy.
customer_reviews.author: sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Powerful machine; speed not adjustable; handle is counterintuitive
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful machine but the speed is not adjustable and the handle is the opposite of other lawnmowers. It is confusing and makes cutting stressful for me. If you don’t care about anything but going up and down the yard, this works great. But if you are fussy like me, you want to be able to go around trees, etc.— not possible with this lawn mower.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmaH

customer_reviews.title: one year later
customer_reviews.text: i bought this at the start of the season last year cut great never any problems one belt slip that was easily fixed. made the first cut of the season this year and cranked first try and cut like the first day i got it last year. so i’m impressed
customer_reviews.author: SAINT

customer_reviews.title: Came Broken. Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Welp just opened the box! And already cant use it because the front rim is snapped in half off the axle. You would think that spending 230 bucks that it would at least mow the lawn once.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sooo disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was ridiculed by family and friends for buying a mower on line, however, when I received it and put it together, it looked great. I thought I actually picked well, but the very first time my son mowed, the handle broke! I'm very upset as I paid $265 plus tax on this. Not to mention now everyone saying "told you so"! Totally bummed......
customer_reviews.author: wendy gerondale

customer_reviews.title: Seems fine
customer_reviews.text: Seems fine no reverse no features but works. A little weird push three times to pump before start is in front rather than side. Handle and wheels into axel could be better but if it last at least five to ten years I be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Over all great, could be better
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the lawnmower at first. Easy to assemble and worked great. After 3 uses though the belt felt off, I got it put back on and two tries after using it again the belt fell off again. The only issue I have. Other than it's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service/company to deal with
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine and it broke down less than a year after it was bought.i barely use it . The worst of it all is that i have been trying to contact the manufacturer to cover the repairs and nobody is picking up their phone.I have sent various emails and no reply. I do not encourage anybody to but this product.The customer service is nothing to write home about..too bad
customer_reviews.author: ob

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great performance
customer_reviews.text: After simple assembly, added oil and gas the engine fired up with the first pull. Only on one occasion has it not fired on first pull, be sure to use the primer button. I mow 3.5 to 4.0 miles of grass mulching all the way and the mower loves it. I'm now mulching wet fresh fallen leaves and couldn't be more satisfied. Free shipping to my door was a bonus but so far the overall use and performance of this machine is an easy match to my "Craftsman" that scoured the earth for seven years.
customer_reviews.author: Jane McFeaters

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this lawn mower I would use my next door neighbors finally decided to buy one he had a troy bilt let's just say I wouldnt think twice about buying this one over that one it wasnt a older model either didnt offer as much options as this one does love it con: idk if I assembled it right but the gas wire gets in the way of the bag in the lower part, but Ive learned to work around it
customer_reviews.author: Martin/Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous mower !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a dangerous mower. Flys up in front very fast when self propel bar is engaged. Goes way too fast. It's insane!!! That's what I get for buying a chinese mower.
customer_reviews.author: Hootowl10

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, fired right up, no issues with it so far, it seems to run pretty strong. Kind of an odd engine, you have to use a funnel to put oil in it at the base of it.
customer_reviews.author: jeffery salmons

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy this mower
customer_reviews.text: So I used to own a landscaping company but life took me into other sales. Anyways, I know my stuff and know how to mow a residential lawn. This lawn mower is fine but the bag WILL NOT stay on the mower. Pass this mower up. I wish I did.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: So far only used it once but it started on the first pull. Did a good job of mowing the grass even. There is a lot of plastic on this mower so I don't know sturdy it is going to be. So far I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Phil H

customer_reviews.title: U get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: This is not a very bad or good lawn mower would I buy this again no but it’s okish it still have mine working but it’s not that great
customer_reviews.author: Laurence

customer_reviews.title: Many things!
customer_reviews.text: This rear wheel drive really not good ! Just OK ! Cause front wheel drive go little better than rear wheel BUT AWD are best !
customer_reviews.author: Roderick Shirley Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Mower
customer_reviews.text: I like the self propelled feature but it goes a little fast for me I need to learn how to adjust the speed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mower.. lightweight and fun to use. Fast rear drive is different but great just the same.
customer_reviews.author: MikeVan

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Great mower. Starts without issue within 1 or 2 pulls. It has great power even for a little longer damp grass. The speed is not adjustable but is set at a good pace.
customer_reviews.author: JPAC1

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this the self propelled stopped working after one use
customer_reviews.text: Well my wife had trouble putting it together and did not come with oil and after she cut the grass one time the self propelled stopped working this is totally honest review I'm actually really upset about this purchase beware of this product go to homedepot and get a lawnmower because if it breaks they will replace it immediately
customer_reviews.author: James Moya

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and highly recommended. I have owned it for about 6 month and have had no issues or complaints about it.
customer_reviews.author: demetri vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Fast Shipping!
customer_reviews.text: Good Product, Fast Shipping! Best Deal on the Internet For a "Self Propelled Rear Drive Wheel" Lawn Mower!
customer_reviews.author: cgdrider

customer_reviews.title: Junk product
customer_reviews.text: The self-propelled device lasted only 3 hours of operation. Called for advice and no response. Do not stand behind their product. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald White

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The self propelled feature goes too fast. You have to run after it. Other than that, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Simon H Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Easy Mower!
customer_reviews.text: Love my new PowerSmart Mower, with the self propel it makes it so easy to maintain my yard!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Rhamy

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: This mower is not for everyone. It movers a t a good pace!!!
customer_reviews.author: kirk milliren

customer_reviews.title: The propelled quit working after 2 1/2 cuts!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only used 3 Times. While using the mower, the handle pressed down for the the self propelled engaged, it quit working. No noise heard & didn’t run over anything except the grass. I paid a lot of money and I expect it to last awhile. !!!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Coleman

customer_reviews.title: I love this lawn mower!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about this lawn mower. After putting in the oil and gas, the mower literally started up on the first pull! It has a really strong engine that pulls the mower along at a fairly brisk pace. HIGHLY recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ricks

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Basically came assembled, which is great! Easy to maneuver & does the job. No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Steph & Joey

customer_reviews.title: Nice mower
customer_reviews.text: It goes very fast on self propelled and no way to slow it down
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought it new, came used
customer_reviews.text: I bought it new but when it came it was used and old grass was on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Harith

customer_reviews.title: A great value in a versatile mower!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t regulate the pace. -speed is preset. It is a bit fast in some applications.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Eastman

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quicker than expected. Great product! Easy to assemble! Runs great!
customer_reviews.author: James Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality of unit was apparent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect mower for my needs and price point. Works Fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph McKinstry

customer_reviews.title: Performance reliability.
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my son. He is very happy with the performance!
customer_reviews.author: Bijan

customer_reviews.title: Great mower
customer_reviews.text: Love this mower got it so my boyfriend and myself could mow easily and this has site helped. Love the self-propelled option. Height adjustment works well. Mower does not come with oil. Some assembly required but not too bad. Handles very well for a house in the boonies with lots of grass, sticks, and all that. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Carmichael

customer_reviews.title: Better than my husqvarna for way better price... delivered!
customer_reviews.text: this is a great mower! I’m really tough on mowers.... blown up 2 $400 husqvarna mowers and this new mower is has more power and pushes itself! Has power too pulled me around my 3/4 acre 4x4 yard easily!
customer_reviews.author: steven j.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mower! Great price!
customer_reviews.text: After months of use I rate this 5 stars. Would buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: SandyFans

customer_reviews.title: Easy Working lawn mower.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together and real easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

product_meta.title: PowerSmart DB2321S Lawn Mower, Black and red
product_meta.description: Ideal for the smaller yd, the compact, 161cc self-propelled gas-powered power smart DB2321S Self propelled lawn mower is easy to operate in tight spaces & features three cutting systems including side discharge option & mulching capability plus a collection rear bag. Offering a smart, powerful, highly efficient & lightweight design & the DB2321S features a rear wheel drive mode that makes it easier to maneuver on uneven & rough. The deep dome deck design accompanied with the sharp & solid blade makes for better mulching. Easy to operate & weighing just 90. 4 lbs. , the mower also features a durable steel deck that cuts a 21 in. Swath & adjustable height from 1. 18 to 3 in. To meet your varying needs.
feature_bullets: Powered by 161 cc engine delivering the right amount of power in a compact, lightweight package
3-In-1 bag, side discharge and mulching capability allows you to spread grass clippings to the side, returning key nutrients to your lawn so your grass can grow healthy and thick
5-position height adjustment allows you to change the cutting height to easily cut grass, weeds and overgrowth, and the 8-inch rear wheels make it easy to move.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars112 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
